name: Escape Dungeon Raknaz
description:
Can you escape the dungeon Raknaz where cultists have imprisoned you?

Game includes:

  • Stealth
  • Puzzles
  • Uncanny cultists
  • Metal pipe to attack with
  • Severed limbs

Try it out!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys - move
  • Space - Attack
  • Space - Interact

(Not tested on Mac or Linux/GNU)
